review: Absolutely love my fire stick! Easy to use and I have everything plus more at my fingertips!
author: Ashley Stewart

review: This is an awesome product. I bought two!!  Once we installed the first one, and saw how great it worked, I immediately ordered another.  So if you do not have a "Smart TV", don't think you have to miss out on viewing content from Hulu, NetFlix, Pandora, etc.  Just get the Fire TV Stick - easy to install, same viewing pleasure as a Smart TV (which I do have one of, so I know.)
author: Susan

review: Works faster than our previous instant view technology, but has some trouble with play and pause.  Sometimes if I pause a show, it won't start playing again when I press the play/pause button.  This also happens in reverse.  I have to rewind a bit and then hit play to get started again.  However, easy set-up, quick play, gets the services that I want at a great purchase price.
author: Willis
